trans-unit.source: Delete a user account from a node
trans-unit.target: Delete a user account from a node

trans-unit.source: Deletes a user account from the specified node.
trans-unit.target: Deletes a user account from the specified node.

trans-unit.source: See <link xlink:href="0e07b9cb-8fdf-4ff7-b707-e964200df0f8" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Common parameters and headers</link> for headers and parameters that are used by all requests related to user accounts on nodes.
trans-unit.target: See <link xlink:href="0e07b9cb-8fdf-4ff7-b707-e964200df0f8" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Common parameters and headers</link> for headers and parameters that are used by all requests related to user accounts on nodes.

trans-unit.source: Replace {pool-id} with the id of the pool that contains the node.
trans-unit.target: Replace {pool-id} with the id of the pool that contains the node.

trans-unit.source: Replace {node-id} with the name of the node from which you want to delete a user account.
trans-unit.target: Replace {node-id} with the name of the node from which you want to delete a user account.

trans-unit.source: Replace {user-account-name} with the name of the user account to delete.
trans-unit.target: Replace {user-account-name} with the name of the user account to delete.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <link xlink:href="e9da2d54-053a-4392-a5ba-26229c7cc9a5" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Status and Error Codes</link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <link xlink:href="e9da2d54-053a-4392-a5ba-26229c7cc9a5" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Status and Error Codes</link>.

trans-unit.source: You can delete a user account from a node only when it is in the <languageKeyword>idle</languageKeyword> or <languageKeyword>running</languageKeyword> state.
trans-unit.target: You can delete a user account from a node only when it is in the <languageKeyword>idle</languageKeyword> or <languageKeyword>running</languageKeyword> state.
